title: We once danced in harmony with the land...
body:
Then, everything changed when Noxus attacked.
Only Irelia, the Defiant Blade could stop them, but when the Gameplay Boards needed her the most, she was nerfed.
100 years passed and Riot found a new Irelia, reworked version of the previous one.
And although her teaser seemed dope, she has a lot of testing on PBE before she will be able to save anyone.
But I believe, Ireali can be perfect VGU.
_\*le epic music intro\*_

https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=15&v=IPCnts6v_Pc

replies.body:
HOLY SHIT !! IS THAT MOTHERFUCKING AVATAR REFERENCE???
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

> [{quoted}](name=HungryAngry2SPP,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TyjNZNug,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-16T19:10:03.939+0000)
>
> HOLY SHIT !! IS THAT MOTHERFUCKING AVATAR REFERENCE???
> {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

nah dude wtf are you talking about thats definitely Naruto
WTF, Naruto?  Nah man, that's obviously a Spongebob reference.
Spongebob r u serious? Its definitly a Pokémon reference.
Pokemon? I don’t think so it has to be Yu-Gi-Oh!

> [{quoted}](name=Lucky Moniker,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TyjNZNug,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-16T21:10:57.048+0000)
>
> Pokemon? I don’t think so it has to be Yu-Gi-Oh!

Are you blind?! It's Digimon.
This went way the fuck father then it should have. It's obviously full metal alchemist.
Nah, do you even watch Dragonball Z bro? Obviously this is a DBZ reference
People need to chill. I tried to make Vampire Diaries reference and it goes this far?
It's Kung Pow.
Idiots. It's clearly a reference to the incredible niche film _Foodfight!_ Really fantastic film that I recommend you check out.
Oh my sweet baby jesus this is OBVIOUSLY a Cory in the House reference!
Are y'all crazy? It's clearly a Fairly Odd Parents reference.
God damn amateurs. This is literally a straight up reference of Kim Possible.
wtf I'm more than certain this is a game of thrones reference
Calm your butts guys, it's definitely a Doki Doki Literature Club reference.
WAS THAT A JOJO REFERENCE!
Wrong Disney Channel show, it's actually an Oban Star Racers callback.
That’s it... Remember the hidden passives like Leona does -1 damage to champs with Sunglasses... Irelia does +1 to “fire” champs and skins. Make it happen out of respect for the OP

"We once danced in harmony with the land..."
If the terrain doesn't dance when Irelia dances
Special dance interaction with Malphite?
please, riot is only reworking her so they have freshly nerf her again.
This is a good post.
Oh wow lmfao I just now F'ing realized this was a god damned Avatar reference.
